name: RedKnight
description:
This is a free 2D platformer action game and you should be able to finish the game in 10 - 30 minutes (depending on how many times you die). There are 2 stages and 2 bosses in the game. The bosses are supposed to be strong,  but you should be able to win in a few trials.

p.s. The game is in Japanese

Enjoy!
